product_name: Sierra Designs Mountain Guide Tarp Shelter
long_description: Designed to handle extreme wind, snow and rain, this is a tough, floorless 4-person shelter originally built for winter expeditions, but it also excels as basecamp or a mess hall on any trip.
short_description: Designed to handle extreme wind, snow and rain, this is a tough, floorless 4-person shelter originally built for winter expeditions, but it also excels as basecamp or a mess hall on any trip.
